beleaguered_leader.032: Taking one for the team... Time to get a [str(entry.gather_target)]! Time to get to work!

insufferable_academic.000: Fasting for a day merely offers an opportunity to observe the wailings of my monkey mind.
insufferable_academic.001: A day without food is an excellent way to sharpen the mind.
insufferable_academic.002: According to my research, people need to consume at least twenty four units of energy each day to maintain proper function.

hopeless_optimist.000: Wow, I went a whole 24 hours without food!
hopeless_optimist.001: No food by midnight? Maybe I can drink moonlight.
hopeless_optimist.002: So hungry... maybe tomorrow we'll find more berries.

beleaguered_leader.000: It's just 24 hours without food. Don't panic.
beleaguered_leader.002: I'm going to dream about food tonight.
beleaguered_leader.003: A whole day without food? Mustn't complain; got to set a good example.

psychopathic_misanthrope.000: A whole day without food? My stomach is going to start eating itself.
psychopathic_misanthrope.001: Went a whole day without eating a single thing. Tomorrow, my 'friends' had better watch out.
psychopathic_misanthrope.002: I may not have eaten all day today, but I'm still a badass.
psychopathic_misanthrope.003: No food in camp today, huh? Maybe I can find something in the forest to kill tomorrow.

generic.001: I wish I had something to eat.
generic.002: Going a who day without food makes me so, so sad.

diligent_sweetheart.000: It's okay, I don't need to eat every day.
diligent_sweetheart.001: By the precepts of the Church of Plenty, we should eat at least once a day.

teacher.000: A day without food? At home we used to go a whole week for the festival of [str(entry.teacher)]!

lovable_rogue.000: 24 hours without food? I'm sure I could find an opportunity here, if I weren't so hungry.
lovable_rogue.001: Nobody's eaten in a while. I could make a killing if I just had one of mom's apple pies.
lovable_rogue.002: Going without food for a whole day is surprisingly hard.

beleaguered_leader.000: I don't know how long we can last without food.
beleaguered_leader.001: Has anyone found any animals to eat yet?
beleaguered_leader.002: Keep on the lookout for berry bushes, or something!
beleaguered_leader.004: I have to stop dreaming about food every night.

psychopathic_misanthrope.000: Is there anyone around here I can eat?
psychopathic_misanthrope.001: I need to kill something small and furry.

diligent_sweetheart.000: I'm so hungry... Step 1: Learn carpentry!
diligent_sweetheart.001: It's okay, I didn't really need to eat today.
diligent_sweetheart.002: I wish I could bake a cheesecake.
diligent_sweetheart.003: If we huddle around the fire at night, that's almost as good as eating, right?
diligent_sweetheart.004: I really don't want to die here.

teacher.000: [str(entry.teacher)], even if I don't make it, keep my friends safe, okay?

lovable_rogue.000: In retrospect, I really should have hoarded those berries.
lovable_rogue.001: It's a pity you can't eat silver and gold.
lovable_rogue.002: That wood is starting to look like chocolate...

teacher.000: As [str(entry.teacher)] is my witness, I will never go hungry again!

insufferable_academic.000: Hunger is merely a state of mind.
insufferable_academic.001: To be, or not to be, that is the question...
insufferable_academic.002: The needs of the stomach are merely a distraction from the pursuits of the mind.
insufferable_academic.004: I refuse to allow my vast intellect to succumb to base starvation!
insufferable_academic.005: According to my research, people need to consume at least twenty four units of energy each day to maintain proper function.

hopeless_optimist.000: Oh, great! Another day without food... That's exactly that little push I needed for starting my diet!
hopeless_optimist.001: Hunger really sharpens the colors in the world!
hopeless_optimist.002: I think there's a hole in my stomach.

generic.001: If I could just get some food, maybe my stomach would feel better.
generic.002: I don't know how much longer I can go without food.

psychopathic_misanthrope.000: You want me to be the weaver? Everything I know about weaving: jab the pointy end into the other person. This should be interesting.

hopeless_optimist.000: Woo! Now that I'm the weaver, I live to make comfy beds for everyone!

insufferable_academic.000: There is a meditative grace in fine knotwork. Stare, my friends, stare until your souls belong to meeeeee.

beleaguered_leader.000: I don't know... I always expected a more epic role in life. Well, this will probably be good for my blood pressure.

lovable_rogue.000: Hmm... if a spider is a weaver, is a weaver like a spider? Everyone shall sleep safe in my webs. ...Was that too creepy?

diligent_sweetheart.000: Oh! First thing's first--time to make everyone a new winter scarf!

party.description: Organizes troops into groups for combat

insane_alligator.description: Smaller varanuses tend to flock around them.

skeleton_giants.description: The rattling of their massive bones is enough to make anyone tremble!

step005.title: Click X to close this window

step004.title: Click the Craft button to craft the workshop

step001.title: Open the workshop menu
step001.description: Use this menu to manage the various crafting workshops of your citizens.

step000.title: Set Up a Workbench
step000.description: Our carpenter needs a crafting station in order to craft items for the town. Let's make a workbench!

step001.title: Open the Build Menu
step001.description: Use this menu to build structures and place items in your town.

step000.title: Place the Carpenter's Workbench
step000.description: Now that we've crafted the workbench, we need to place it in town for the Carpenter to use.

step003.title: Click the Carpenter's Workshop item
step003.description: Select the workshop and click to place it somewhere in town.

step000.title: Congratulations!
step000.description: We've got resources, a place to store goods, and a way to craft items. We're well on our way to getting this settlement off the ground!

scenario_data.declined_text: I don't need a tutorial -- I know what to do!

food_for_days.description: La grande quantità di cibo stipata nella parte posteriore della roulotte dovrebbe far funzionare i cittadini per una manciata di giorni mentre mettono in piedi il loro insediamento.
food_for_days.tooltip: Un'opzione sicura per i nuovi giocatori, sebbene priva di difesa.

merchant_caravan.description: Una raccolta di strumenti commerciali dovrebbe dare all'insediamento un vantaggio nel deserto.
merchant_caravan.tooltip: Una buona raccolta di abilità artigianali, ma a corto di cibo.

money_solves_all_problems.description: Tutto ciò di cui la città ha bisogno dovrebbe essere in grado di acquistarlo da un commerciante. Supponendo che uno li trovi e abbia i beni adeguati per la vendita ...
money_solves_all_problems.display_name: Il denaro risolve tutti i problemi
money_solves_all_problems.tooltip: Una scelta rischiosa ma potenzialmente molto vantaggiosa. Tutto dipende da quando e da quale commerciante arriva.

animal_companion_trait.description: Da quando [name(i18n_data.savior)] [str(i18n_data.maybe_determiner)] [str(i18n_data.maybe_savior_species)] ha salvato il suo [str(i18n_data.savee_species)], [name(i18n_data.savee)], dal pericolo, sono inseparabili.

herbivore_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] è un amico di tutti gli animali! Piante, tanto.

callous_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] non si relaziona mai veramente con gli altri. Questo li aiuta a non ferirsi quando lo colpisce una tragedia, ma la sua costante calma controllata lo rende lento a fare amicizia.

carnivore_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] AMA soltanto gli animali! Specialmente con la salsa piccante.

courageous_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] ama salvare gli altri, ,ette la sicurezza della città come prima cosa.

excitable_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] non sembra mai tenere sotto controllo le proprie emozioni, quindi diventano felici o tristi più velocemente del normale.

green_thumb_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] sembra avere un tocco particolare con le piante.

heart_of_a_crafter_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] ama creare cose per gli altri. se non fa almeno una cosa al giorno, sente che è stata sprecata.

professor_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] aiuterà le persono ad acquistare esperienza nella loro classe, anche se le loro spiegazioni tendono ad essere un po'... lunghe.

featherweight_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] gli piace camminare un po' più veloce degli altri, tranne se portano qualcosa, il che li fa rallentare notevolmente.

pack_mule_trait.description: Questo cittadino ama trasportare cose in giro! Per ragioni inspiegabili, si muovono più velocemente quando portano qualcosa nel loro zaino.

glutton_trait.description: Lo stomaco di [name(i18n_data.entity)] potrebbe anche essere un portale per un altro mondo per quanto sono in grado di mangiare. Forse questo spiega un po 'della loro capacità di recupero, però.

hothead_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] non si arrende mai volontariamente da un combattimento. Anche da quelli che probabilmente dovrebbe...

night_owl_trait.description: La giornata inizia solo quando il sole è tramontato.

optimistic_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] guarda sempre il lato positivo e vede un rivestimento d'argento in quasi tutto.

passion_job_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] ha sempre sognato di essere un [str(i18n_data.passion_job)], forse adesso avrà la possibilità?

pessimistic_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)]  è una persona di vetro mezzo vuota.

cultist_trait.description: Questo cittadino continua a borbottare su una sorta di "dio coniglietto" un segreto che dorme eternamente. Di cosa si tratta?

jokester_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] ama raccontare barzellette. Sono buoni? È difficile da dire, ma spesso sembrano lasciare gli altri con un sorriso.

charismatic_trait.description: Quando [name(i18n_data.entity)] entra in una stanza, le persone lo notano sempre.

gregarious_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] ama discutere gli eventi della giornata con gli altri e diventa un po' solitario quando non lo fanno.

loner_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] in realtà non si preoccupa per la compagnia degli altri. Preferiscono stare da soli.

empathetic_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] è molto sensibile all'umore della città e sembra sempre annullarsi.

opinionated_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] ha un'opinione su tutto e non è timido nel condividerlo.

magnificent_beard_trait.description: Questo cittadino ha una barba davvero magnifica.

stoic_trait.description: A causa del loro temperamento uniforme, ci vuole molto per rendere questo cittadino felice o triste.

gourmand_trait.description: Solo il più gustoso degli alimenti è il benvenuto al palato di [name(i18n_data.entity)]. Diventano felici quando mangiano cibi di qualità superiore, ma i pasti di bassa qualità sono piuttosto sgradevoli.

goat_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)] praticamente mangerà qualsiasi cosa. Non sono affatto schizzinosi, a volte con disgusto di coloro che li circondano.

pluviophile_trait.description: [name(i18n_data.entity)]  non ama altro che il dolce tamburo delle gocce di pioggia.

storm_chaser_trait.description: Temporali, tempeste di sabbia, bufere di neve, [name(i18n_data.entity)] li ama tutti!

hestian_trait.description: Questa persona proviene dalla lontana terra di Estia. Quali segreti conoscono?

hungry.tooltip: Potrei davvero restare per un buon pasto.

famished.tooltip: È passato un po' di tempo da quando ho mangiato. Ho davvero bisogno di cibo!

starving.tooltip: Il mio stomaco è un nodo! Se non trovo qualcosa da mangiare presto...

stuffed.tooltip: Il mio ultimo pasto è stato così abbondante che non avrò bisogno di mangiare di nuovo per un po '.

spacious.tooltip: C'è così tanto spazio aperto qui intorno. Mi fa davvero sentire a mio agio.

cramped.tooltip: Mi sento piuttosto angusto. Devo sempre guardare il miei passi per non imbattermi in niente.

very_cramped.tooltip: Questo posto è soffocante! C'è appena spazio per respirare!

dark.tooltip: Questa zona non è molto ben illuminata.

pain_moderate.tooltip: Agh, Non sto in ottima forma!

slept_on_ground.tooltip: La mia schiena mi sta uccidendo per aver dormito per terra. Quando avremo dei letti decenti?

slept_in_shared_bed.display_name: Ho dormito in un letto condiviso
slept_in_shared_bed.tooltip: Sto condividendo il mio letto con qualcun altro in questo momento. Non è il massimo, ma vorrei davvero avere il mio.

slept_in_shared_room.display_name: Ho dormito in una stanza condivisa
slept_in_shared_room.tooltip: Sto condividendo la mia stanza con qualcun altro in questo momento. Vorrei un po' più di privacy.

well_rested.tooltip: Ah, dormire nel mio letto senza sentire altre persone che russano mi lascia sempre rinfrescato.

slept_outside.tooltip: Vorrei avere un riparo e protezione dalle intemperie.

slept_in_comfy_bed.display_name: Ho dormito in un letto comodo
slept_in_comfy_bed.tooltip: Il mio letto è davvero comodo. Quasi non volevo lasciarlo!

ate_unpalatable.tooltip: Mangiare [str(foodname)] non è stata una buonba idea

herbivore_ate_meat.tooltip: Non riesco a credere di aver mangiato un [str(foodname)]. Posso solo immaginare quanto deve essere stato carino... prima...

carnivore_ate_veggies.tooltip: C'è stato un errore. Ho accidentalmente mangiato cibo che mangia il mio cibo.

offended_palate.tooltip: Bleh, odio mangiare cose come [str(foodname)]. Non c'è proprio "zazz"!

pleased_palate.tooltip: Mmm, il mio mio. Dovrei davvero dire agli altri quanto è stato buono [str(foodname)] oggi!

ate_fine.tooltip: Il mio recente pasto è stato fantastico! Chiunque abbia creato la [str(foodname)] ci ha messo davvero il cuore.

ate_tasty.tooltip: Il [str(foodname)] che ho mangiato è stato molto gustoso! Ricordo ancora la combinazione di sapori.

ate_raw.tooltip: Di recente ho mangiato un crudo [str(foodname)]. Posso solo immaginare quanto sarebbe stato meglio se fosse stato cucinato.

ate_bland.tooltip: Ricordo di aver mangiato un insipido [str(foodname)]. Mi ha dato la forza di andare avanti, ma il pasto era così noioso.

ate_item_quality_fine.tooltip: Il mio recente [str(foodname)] è stato <font color='#6be9e7'>Finemente</font> preparato, il che lo ha reso ancora più delizioso!

ate_item_quality_excellent.tooltip: Il mio recente [str (foodname)] è stato <font color='#ce71d2'>Eccellente!</font> Era davvero qualcosa!

ate_item_quality_masterwork.tooltip: Ho appena mangiato un <font color='#E3AC53'>magistralmente</font> preparato di [str(nome food)]! Non sapevo che potesse avere un sapore così buono!

ate_cooked.display_name: Il mio pasto è stato cucinato
ate_cooked.tooltip: I always enjoy the 'warm belly' feeling after a nice prepared meal.

helped_out.tooltip: Wow, the Amberstone warren was amazing! I feel so honored to have helped them out.

harvested_bramble.tooltip: Feels good to do my part, taking an axe to this Titan's corrupt undergrowth!

harvested_root.display_name: Chopped down a Root of Evil
harvested_root.tooltip: That's one step closer to kicking this Titan out for good!

titan_victory.tooltip: We did it! The air seems cleaner now, and I don't feel like there's always something watching me...

no_more_titan.tooltip: It feels nice to live in a place without an ancient darkness lurking below it for once!

pioneering_spirit.tooltip: We've left our home to build a new one. We will make it better than before!

settling_in.tooltip: I'm starting to feel at home, but there's work yet to be done.

level_2.tooltip: We've been recognized as a fully fledged settlement!  Our work is starting to pay off.

lack_of_safety.tooltip: Without some form of city guard, I just don't feel at ease in this wilderness.

petty_theft.tooltip: Someone stole something from our supplies! We need better defenses.

outpost.tooltip: We've just established an Outpost! Time to get working on it!

settlement.tooltip: Our outpost is now a fully-fledged Settlement! Hurrah!

town.tooltip: We've been recognized as a Town! Our work is starting to pay off!

tired.tooltip: It's been awhile since I've slept.

exhausted.tooltip: It feels like forever since I've slept.. I can barely keep my eyes open.

fatigued.tooltip: I've been on my feet for too long. I really need some time to sleep.

panicked.tooltip: I'm not proud of how I acted when the monsters came, but it's all I could think to do.

misses_pet.tooltip: Although it's been awhile since they died, I still catch myself sometimes looking for my pet, [str(pet_name)].

plant_lover.tooltip: Every time I interact with plants I feel a bit calmer.

fruitful_labors.tooltip: It always feels good to make something with one's own hands. It helps clear my mind.

idle_hands.tooltip: I've not made anything in awhile and feel like a layabout. Isn't there something I can craft?

protected_the_town.tooltip: We fended off a group of nasties recently, it really got my blood pumping!

loves_their_job.tooltip: This is the perfect job for me! I love what I do day to day.

inspired.tooltip: [str(target_name)] is in quite good spirits today. They're really pleasant to be around!

discouraged.tooltip: Sheesh, [str(target_name)] is no fun when they're in a bad mood.

lonely.tooltip: It's been awhile since I've talked to anyone. I really need to get some stuff off my chest.

enjoys_company.tooltip: It's always great to spend some time with my fellow town members.

annoyed_with_others.tooltip: Why do these people keep talking to me? It keeps distracting me from what's important.

alone_with_thoughts.tooltip: Being away from others has given me the time to reflect and clear my mind.

everyone_worse_off.tooltip: Seeing everyone else in worse spirits just brings me down.

everyone_happier.tooltip: Everyone else seems to be in a better mood than me. Maybe I should look at things differently.

ate_not_bad_food.tooltip: My [str(foodname)] today was a little tasty, but didn't seem that different from what I normally eat.

ate_some_food.tooltip: I had some [str(foodname)] today. It was alright, but I don't see what the big deal is.

townmember_died.tooltip: A fellow townmember has died. If only we had been more watchful!

pet_died.tooltip: My poor [str(pet_name)] passed away recently. I'll miss them quite a bit.

saved_from_mortal_wounds.tooltip: I would have died back there were it not for those around me! I'm grateful for this second chance.

gained_a_level.tooltip: I've been at this job long enough to gain a new insight! I can feel myself becoming better at my work.

great_talk.tooltip: Talking with [str(target_name)] today was really nice.

great_joke.tooltip: Hahaha, just thinking of the joke [str(target_name)] told makes me crack up!

tough_crowd.tooltip: [str(target_name)] didn't laugh at my joke. Was it really that bad?

nuzzled.tooltip: Awww, my pet [str(target_name)] always manages to cheer me up.

booped.tooltip: A cute [str(species)] booped me today. It made me feel warm and fuzzy inside.

horrendous.tooltip: Everywhere I look I see something terrible!

beautiful.tooltip: The decor around here is really great. A lot of hard work must have gone into making it look this nice.

ugly.tooltip: Sheesh, it's really ugly around here. We definitely can make this look better!

pleasing.tooltip: It's pretty nice looking around here.

breathtaking.tooltip: Wow, everywhere I look is gorgeous! The attention to detail is amazing!
I love crafting in my workshop; it's so well decorated!

pleasing.tooltip: A well-maintained work space brightens my mood.

beautiful.tooltip: The area around my workbench is looking good, everything is in its place.

ugly.tooltip: It's frustrating that my work space is so grungy.

awe_inspiring.tooltip: My workshop looks so amazing! It's an inspiration!

pleasing.tooltip: Where I slept last night was pretty nice.

beautiful.tooltip: My bedroom is really shaping up; I like it!

breathtaking.tooltip: I love sleeping in such a wonderful bedroom!

awe_inspiring.tooltip: When I went to bed last night, I felt like royalty.

beautiful.tooltip: I was happy to eat in such an attractive spot!

breathtaking.tooltip: Someone really spent some effort decorating our dining room!

awe_inspiring.tooltip: The decor was so great, dinner was a feast for both my eyes and my stomach!

pleasing.tooltip: It was nice to eat my meal in a comfortable space.

ugly.tooltip: The ugly surroundings made it difficult to enjoy my last meal.

windy_positive.tooltip: The breeze is caressing my skin.

blizzard_negative.tooltip: Oh, the weather outside is frightful!

thunderstorm_negative.tooltip: That lightning bolt almost hit me!

sunny_positive.tooltip: Endless sunshine, warmth, and blue skies.

cloudy_positive.tooltip: Overcast skies: perfect for lazing around on the porch.

sunny_negative.tooltip: I have to shield my eyes just to walk outside. And don't get me started on the sunburn!

thunderstorm_positive.tooltip: It's so exciting to hear the thunder rolling in!

windy_negative.tooltip: The wind outside is biting at my skin.

blizzard_positive.tooltip: That fierce blizzard outside makes this a day to remember!

rain_positive.tooltip: The drip, drip, drip of the raindrops is soothing all my worries!

rain_negative.tooltip: I almost stepped in a puddle. Now my feet are cold.

lucky.tooltip: Something good is going to happen today. I just feel it!

snow_negative.tooltip: Brrr! I can barely feel my toes.

sandstorm_negative.tooltip: The sands are blowing across the landscape. Hide your poyos! Hide your sheep!

snow_positive.tooltip: The world is hushed and white with snow.

foggy_negative.tooltip: Was that a goblin skulking around in the fog?

foggy_positive.tooltip: I wonder what wonders lie beneath that mysterious mist.

sandstorm_positive.tooltip: The sands always come to test our fortitude... Mine is unwavering.

titanstorm_negative.display_name: The End Times are Upon Us!
titanstorm_negative.tooltip: The Titan's gonna destroy everything! Run for your lives!

titanstorm_positive.tooltip: We're stronger than some 'Titan'! The evil monster's big, and it's scary, but I believe in our town!!

sandy_negative.tooltip: Oh no... I have sand and dust everywere!  It's in my eyes!

snow_sunny_positive.tooltip: The snow is glistening from the winter sun.

rain_sunny_positive.tooltip: The sun is shimmering through the rain drops...

snow_sunny_negative.tooltip: I am freezing! And the sunshine reflecting off the snow too is bright!

rain_sunny_negative.tooltip: This would have been a perfect day, if not for the rain.

sandy_positive.tooltip: The dust storms remind us of the cycle of life...

koda.tooltip: An adorable little ghost kitten wanted some scritches!

jacko.tooltip: I saw a spectral panther!  It protected the town from danger!

windy.description: Howling winds and roaring gales sweep the lands.

thunderstorm.description:
Thunder rolled... It rolled a six.
  • Plant growth speed is slightly increased.
  • Vision radius is reduced.
  • Unsheltered hearthlings sometimes get hit by lightning.
  • The ground and trees sometimes get hit by lightning.

sunny.description: Yet another day of endless sunshine and blue skies.

snow.description:
Cold, frost, and sunshine: day of wonder! Why are you, friend, still deep in slumber?
  • Plant growth speed is reduced.
  • Vision radius is slightly reduced.
  • Unsheltered hearthlings are too cold to work as effectively.
  • Unsheltered pasture animals are hurt by the cold.

snow_sunny.description:
What a beautiful winter wonderland it is today!
  • Plant growth speed is reduced.
  • Vision radius is only slightly reduced.
  • Unsheltered hearthlings are too cold to work as effectively.
  • Unsheltered pasture animals are hurt by the cold.

sandstorm.description:
Cover your eyes. Cover your ears. In fact, just stay inside.
  • Unsheltered hearthlings are too hot to work as effectively.
  • Vision radius is slightly reduced.
  • Clouds of sand pass across the landscape, destroying crops and hurting everyone.

sandy_day.description:
There is sand and dust... everywhere!
  • Unsheltered hearthlings are too hot to work as effectively.
  • Vision radius is only slightly reduced.

rain.description:
Water! Water from the skies!
  • Plant growth speed is slightly increased.
  • Vision radius is slightly reduced.

rain_sunny.description:
Its raining, but the sun is peaking out!
  • Plant growth speed is increased.
  • Vision radius is only slightly reduced.

lucky.description:
Today, everything is just a tiny bit better.
  • Hearthlings find all their ailments healed, as if by magic.
  • Hearthlings are slightly luckier in everything they do.
  • A mysterious rainbow sometimes appears.

foggy.description:
A cover of fog crawls across the landscape, hiding untold mysteries.
  • Undead monsters come out of hiding under the cover of the fog.
  • Vision radius is greatly reduced.

cloudy.description: Overcast skies, perfect for lazing around on the porch.

blizzard.description:
Wind, and snow, and hail, oh my!
  • Plant growth speed is greatly reduced.
  • Vision radius is greatly reduced.
  • Unsheltered hearthlings are too cold to work as effectively.
  • Unsheltered pasture animals are hurt by the cold.

titanstorm.description: It's garying outside, everybody! Chop tentacles on sight.

test_weather.description: A weather that can't affect tests

bugs.name: Bug
bugs.description: Bugs produce bug meat, used by the cook, and chitin, used in some armor recipes

critters.name: Small Animal
critters.description: Small animals produce jerky and pelts

shield_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling to a knight

cloth_padded_vest.description: Provides light protection in a fight.

cloth_padded_vest_iconic.description: Provides light protection in a fight. Every little bit helps!

iron_mail.description: A full suit of iron armor

iron_mail_iconic.description: A full suit of iron armor

steel_mail.description: A full suit of steel armor

steel_mail_iconic.description: A full suit of steel armor

steel_shield.description: A sturdy shield made from steel

steel_circlet.description: Light weight and strong protection for one's head

simple_quiver.description: A light quiver of slowing arrows

fire_quiver.description: Sets enemies on fire, dealing damage over time

cobblestone_fence_gate_ghost.description: Its thick stone walls grant a sense of security.

picket_fence_ghost.description: If it's not white, is our life unfulfilled?

picket_fence_gate_ghost.description: Don't like your neighbors? Don't install.

wooden_double_door_ghost.description: A larger door. It makes quite an impression.

wooden_window_frame_tall_ghost.description: Extra height adds an air of elegance

golden_clay_doorframe_ghost.description: Matches a golden clay exterior wall

blue_clay_door_ghost.description: Blue like a dream of ocean

green_clay_window_frame_ghost.description: Lets in the soft desert air.

latticed_clay_window_frame_ghost.description: The lattice still lets the good air in.

stone_tunnel_door_ghost.description: Useful for sealing off mine tunnels.

clay_tunnel_door_ghost.description: Useful for sealing off mine tunnels

iron_door_ghost.description: Studier than wooden or stone doors

wooden_door_2_fine_ghost.description: Sturdier than your average door, and such a sweet pattern too.

wooden_double_door_fine_ghost.description: A larger door with some extra style. All your friends will be envious.

wooden_window_frame_tall_fine_ghost.description: Extra height adds an air of elegance

picket_fence_fine_ghost.description: If it's not white, is our life unfulfilled?

picket_fence_gate_fine_ghost.description: Don't like your neighbors? Don't install.

green_latticed_window_ghost.description: The latticed window you know and love, now in green!

tan_latticed_window_ghost.description: The latticed window you know and love, in tan

tall_clay_window_ghost.description: Still lets in the soft desert air

ornate_picket_fence_ghost.description: A little gold leaf goes a long way!

ornate_wooden_double_door_ghost.description: A larger door with some extra style. All your friends will be envious.

ornate_picket_fence_bar_single_ghost.description: A little gold leaf goes a long way!

ornate_picket_fence_bar_double_ghost.description: A little gold leaf goes a long way!

clay_fence_gate_ghost.description: This decorative gate protects your fences from being broken.

stone_window_frame_ghost.description: Offers a little protection from the wind.

stone_window_frame_wide_wood_ghost.display_name: Wide Wood and Stone Window Frame

stone_window_frame_wood_ghost.description: Offers a little protection from the wind.

stone_window_frame_tall_ghost.description: Extra height adds an air of elegance

stone_window_frame_crossbeam_ghost.description: Offers a little protection from random critters trying to get in.

stone_double_door_ghost.description: A larger door. It makes quite an impression.

picket_fence_combo_ghost.description: If it's not white, is our life unfulfilled?

ornate_picket_fence_combo_ghost.description: A little gold leaf goes a long way!

amberstone_chest_ghost.description: Stores 64 items - that's 8-by-8, for the best of luck!

log_pile_ghost.description: Harvest for a large number of logs

stone_pile.description: Harvest for many hunks of stone

clay_pile.description: Harvest for a large amount of clay

wheat_pile.description: Harvest for a large amount of wheat

large_crate_fine_ghost.description: Stores up to 32 items. With style.

leather_bound_chest_fine_ghost.description: Stores up to 64 items. With style.

ornate_leather_bound_chest_ghost.description: Stores up to 64 items. With style.

market_shelf_tall_ground_wood_ghost.description: Other players and Travellers can buy the items stored here.

gem_chest_ghost.description: An ancient gem hangs suspended in the air, it looks valuable!

gem_bits.description: Bits of the larger gem, they are probably worth a hefty sum.

wheat_pile_old_ghost.description: It's still good, if a little mushy in places.

market_shelf_tall_ground_clay_ghost.description: Other players and Travellers can buy the items stored here.

market_shelf_tall_ground_stone_ghost.description: Other players and Travellers can buy the items stored here.

poyo.description: Plump and tasty wild fowl.  It eats a little bit of everything.

rabbit.description: Om nom nom.  This cute creature only eats greens.

racoon.description: Small forest creature that eats anything.

sheep.description: So fluffy!  It eats greens, and sometimes cud.
sheep.unripe_description: This sheep is still quite naked.

squirrel.description: Small forest creature that only eats plants.

woodchuck.description: A voracious eater of almost everything, especially logs.

boar.description: Smells like something... stinky...  It eats a little bit of everything.

brightbell_crop.description: Can be used as a healing herb

carrot_crop.description: Fast-growing, but pretty bland on its own.

frostsnap_crop.description: Can be used as a healing herb

gingercap_crop.description: Fast-growing staple crop, but not particularly nutritious nor delicious.

pumpkin_crop.description: Big, round, and fast-growing, but tasty it is not.

watermelon_crop.description: Takes a while to grow, but very fun to eat!

silkweed_crop.description: This plant's fiber can be spun into thread

000.name: Silkweed seedling
000.description: Still a long way to grow.

003.name: Immature silkweed
003.description: Flossy hairs are beginning to emerge

tester_silkweed_crop.description: This plant's fiber can be spun into thread

turnip_crop.description: Fast-growing staple crop, but not particularly nutritious nor delicious.

oak_tree_crop.description: Out of trees? Get ready to participate in reforestation.

003.name: Oak Tree Sapling
003.description: Ready to be transferred to a bigger plot.

000.name: Acorn
000.description: Even a mighty tree has humble beginnings.

002.name: Oak Tree Sprout
002.description: Reach for the sun, little oakling.

acacia_tree_crop.description: Out of trees? Get ready to participate in reforestation.

003.name: Acacia Tree Sapling
003.description: Ready to be transferred to a bigger plot.

000.name: Seed Pod
000.description: Even a mighty tree has humble beginnings.

002.name: Acacia Tree Sprout
002.description: Perfect size for a baby giraffe.

golden_gourd_crop.description: Much prettier than it is tasty

002.name: Mature Cactus
002.description: Wait for its flower to bloom

cactus_tree_crop.description: Out of cactus? Get ready to replant that beautiful desert-scape.

003.name: Cactus Sapling
003.description: Ready to be transferred to a bigger plot.

000.name: Pollinated Flower Pod
000.description: Even a mighty cactus has humble beginnings.

002.name: Cactus Sprout
002.description: Perfect size for a baby lizard.

juniper_tree_crop.description: Forest running thin? Plant some of these gorgeous Juniper trees.

003.name: Juniper Sapling
003.description: Ready to be transferred to a bigger plot.

000.name: Juniper Berry
000.description: Even a mighty juniper has humble beginnings.

002.name: Juniper Sprout
002.description: Perfect size for a rabbit to hide in.

pine_tree_crop.description: Out of trees? Get ready to participate in reforestation.

003.name: Pine Sapling
003.description: Ready to be transferred to a bigger plot.

000.name: Pine Berry
000.description: A new pine tree taking root.

002.name: Pine Sprout
002.description: A perfect tiny pine. Still growing!

sweet_potato_crop.description: Sweet but not very tasty when raw

summon_stone_sleeping_giant_ghost.description: Summons the memory of an ancient slumbering worker.

archer_description.description: A ranged combat unit that shoots foes with arrows

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The archer is able to use a bow to shoot arrows at enemies

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The archer's shots ignore 50% of the target's armor

level_3_data.perk_000_description: The Archer can attack enemies from further away

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Archer can attack enemies from very far away

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The archer shoots arrows with greater speed

level_6_data.perk_000_description: The archer learns the ancient art of quick shots, allowing rapid firing of two arrows in rapid succession

slowing_arrow.description: Movement speed slowed by Spikey Arrows

fire_arrow.description: Set aflame! Taking fire damage every 5 minutes for 15 minutes

level_1_data.perk_001_description: Have a chance every fabrication to not consume a stack of building material.

blacksmith_description.description: The Blacksmith refines raw ore into metal bars, then uses those bars to craft weapons, armor, and building parts like gates.

level_6_data.title: Master Blacksmith
level_6_data.perk_000_description: The Blacksmith's mastery of their trade allows them to create the finest weapons and armors seen since the forgotten Phoenix Empire.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Blacksmith is now skilled enough to forge heavy items made of iron.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: Long hours at the forge have unlocked the secret of steel: sharper weapons and lighter armor.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The secrets of bronze are now available to the Blacksmith.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: When inspiration strikes, the Blacksmith may now craft an especially Fine quality of placeable item.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Blacksmith can now create items of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality items more often.

blacksmith_forge_ghost.description: A stone oven for heating metal

blacksmith_hammer.description: Tools of the trade for a blacksmith.

blacksmith_hammer_iconic.description: Tools of the trade for a blacksmith.

blacksmith_hammer_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling to a blacksmith.

blacksmith_workbench_ghost.description: Used by the Blacksmith for crafting.

iron_shield_recipe.flavor: 'Buck up, recruit! Better the shield dent than you!' -Thredd, Man at Arms

bronze_breastplate_recipe.description: Partial but sturdy coverage against blunt and edged weapons.
bronze_breastplate_recipe.flavor: Design reminiscent of the Phoenix's Legions.

bronze_ingot_recipe.description: Two bars of pure bronze. A suitable material for crafted goods.
bronze_ingot_recipe.flavor: The masters of old considered its production, evidence of our triumph over the earth.

bronze_mace_recipe.flavor: The good news: there is no pointy end.

bronze_sword_recipe.description: Basic, but better than fighting with a sharpened stick!
bronze_sword_recipe.flavor: Made in the shape of Braun's own blade.

carpenter_saw_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Carpenter.
carpenter_saw_recipe.flavor: Now the circle can begin anew.

copper_ingot_recipe.description: A bar of pure copper. A suitable material for crafted goods.
copper_ingot_recipe.flavor: Smooth and silky to the touch

gold_ingot_recipe.description: A bar of pure gold. A suitable material for crafted goods.

iron_ingot_recipe.description: A bar of pure Iron. A suitable material for crafted goods.
iron_ingot_recipe.flavor: To both swords and plowshares, what an egg is to a chicken.

iron_mace_recipe.flavor: And Erin rested her forehead upon it, and the iron stole away enchantment and memory, together.

iron_mail_recipe.description: A full suit of heavy, durable iron armor.
iron_mail_recipe.flavor: But he'd hidden his heart in an iron fortress, and no fey could touch it. --Songs of Evermarth

iron_pike_recipe.flavor: 'Coward,' Elden spat. 'Face me blade to blade, or no knight be you.'

long_sword_recipe.description: Sharp, with extra reach. A faithful weapon.
long_sword_recipe.flavor: 'Hah! The only weapon worthy of specialization. --Lady Giest

short_sword_recipe.description: Stubby, but its steel blade keeps an edge.
short_sword_recipe.flavor: But, does it glow when orcs are near?

silver_ingot_recipe.description: A bar of pure silver. A suitable material for crafted goods.
silver_ingot_recipe.flavor: A pair of silver shoes once started a Phoenix war over currency.

steel_ingot_recipe.description: A bar of pure steel. A suitable material for crafted goods.
steel_ingot_recipe.flavor: The beginning of the modern age.

steel_mail_recipe.description: A full suit of heavy, durable steel armor.

tin_ingot_recipe.description: A bar of pure tin. A suitable material for crafted goods.
tin_ingot_recipe.flavor: Step 1: Beat thin. Step 2: Use to cover roof of town hall.

trapper_knife_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Trapper.
trapper_knife_recipe.flavor: Keep your edge whisker sharp, boy, and cut quick. --Willard Foxghost

two_handed_sword_recipe.description: Double the hands, double the trouble.

blacksmith_forge_recipe.flavor: In flame, purity, in purity, strength. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

blacksmith_workbench_recipe.description: Used to create weapons and armor out of ingots.
blacksmith_workbench_recipe.flavor: It is no coincidence that the metaphors of good character descend from work of the smith. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

vault_recipe.flavor: Conceived by the brilliant Arci, Survivor of Chaat

steel_helmet_recipe.flavor: Long considered the epitome of headgear; doubles as a fine soup pot - Roke Tastybakes II

steel_shield_recipe.description: Grants the ability to completely block attacks.
steel_shield_recipe.flavor: Incredibly protective. Small children play turtle underneath.

knights_shield_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Knight

iron_circlet_recipe.description: It's quite heavy, but protects one's head

steel_circlet_recipe.description: Light weight and strong head protection

decorative_elite_gong_recipe.description: Inspired by the Elite Kobold Menace
decorative_elite_gong_recipe.flavor: As it turns out, their hats were very dense

decorative_generals_gong_recipe.flavor: The generals hat, when melted down, could have filled a lake with gold

decorative_master_gong_recipe.description: Inspired by the Master Kobold Archer

decorative_scout_gong_recipe.flavor: Even scouts are adorned with gold

silver_mail_recipe.flavor: Cid loved the color of strawberries

silver_helmet_recipe.flavor: Inspired by the plumes of the Phoenix

bronze_helm_recipe.flavor: The iron workers insisted they had perfected the art, but the bronze workers argued their's was prettier.

engineer_wrench_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Engineer

input_bin_iron_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_bin_iron_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

input_table_ground_iron_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_table_ground_iron_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

input_corner_ground_iron_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_corner_ground_iron_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

sign_blacksmith_recipe.description: An iron-forged sign, to be displayed outside a blacksmith's workshop
sign_blacksmith_recipe.flavor: Its chains rattle and sing brightly with every hammer strike

lantern_iron_recipe.description: Glows like the heart of the forge

lamppost_rustic_recipe.description: Humbly illuminates any pathway or patio

lamppost_rustic_double_recipe.flavor: Two heads are better than one

gate_iron_recipe.flavor: Luckily, if you can't swing the doors open, you can just squeeze through them

candle_iron_double_recipe.flavor: A stately fixture that belongs wherever Hearthlings gather

door_blacksmith_recipe.description: Fit for a master blacksmith's workshop
door_blacksmith_recipe.flavor: You can feel the heat coming through the door

lamppost_upscale_double_recipe.description: Lovely lighting for any pathway or promenade
lamppost_upscale_double_recipe.flavor: More light probably means more style. Probably

lamppost_upscale_recipe.description: Lovely lighting for any pathway or promenade
lamppost_upscale_recipe.flavor: Stylish enough to make even the most stubborn poyo think twice about roosting on it

lantern_poyo_recipe.flavor: Light as soft and warm as a poyo feather blanket

weathervane_poyo_recipe.flavor: Spins in the winds and never ever gets dizzy

valor_torch_recipe.description: Its flame brings a warm feeling of pride in all we have accomplished.

valor_war_horn_recipe.flavor: The sound of a great horn like this should never be taken lightly... thankfully one hasn't sounded in Darkmoor for many years. -- Cid, Knight of the Old Ways

two_handed_sword_valor_recipe.flavor: Perfectly balanced for its size, and equal to any challenge its wielder takes on

circlet_valor_recipe.flavor: Channels the very heart and soul into healing light

golem_pick_recipe.description: Used by the Geomancer to craft Mole Golems

carpenter_description.description: The Carpenter crafts tools and furniture from wood. The tools he makes unlocks several other jobs.

level_6_data.title: Master Carpenter
level_6_data.perk_000_description: The Carpenter's mastery of his trade allows them access to recipes that expand your town's opportunities.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Carpenter is now skillful enough to use materials created by other crafters.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The Carpenter now has the courage to try more elaborate projects.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The Carpenter can now make a solid array of basic furniture.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: When inspiration strikes, the Carpenter may now craft an especially Fine quality of item.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Carpenter can now create items of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality items more often.

carpenter_saw.description: Tools of the trade for a Carpenter.

carpenter_saw_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Carpenter.

carpenter_workbench_ghost.description: Used by the Carpenter for crafting.

carpenter_toolbench_ghost.description: Used to make fancier kinds of furniture.

arch_backed_chair_recipe.description: Just like a normal chair, except it impresses your neighbors. When sitting, food is 20% more satisfying.
arch_backed_chair_recipe.flavor: Design favored by the Church of Plenty.

comfy_bed_recipe.description: Eight hours will leave you as refreshed as the day you were born.
comfy_bed_recipe.flavor: Nobody ever wants to get out. It makes emergency evacuations awkward.

comfy_chair_recipe.description: Its padded seat guarantees a 98% reduction in awkward splinters!
comfy_chair_recipe.flavor: If pillows are good for the head, surely they're even better for the butt and back!

dining_table_recipe.description: Allows a group of people to all eat together. Like grown-ups.
dining_table_recipe.flavor: Sitting down to eat is a sign of civilization.

dresser_recipe.description: A chest of drawers for storing clothing and personal possessions.

hoe_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Farmer.

large_crate_recipe.description: For compactly storing up to 32 items
large_crate_recipe.flavor: Does the crate that stores all the things that do not store themselves, store itself?

leather_bound_chest_recipe.flavor: Like the one my granda had!

mason_chisel_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Mason.

not_much_of_a_bed_recipe.description: Slightly more comfortable than sleeping on a board.
not_much_of_a_bed_recipe.flavor: Mean as in poor, not cruel. Though it's that too.

park_bench_recipe.description: Outdoor seating for moments of relaxation.
park_bench_recipe.flavor: Life is like a plate of berries.

picket_fence_gate_recipe.description: Lets people through your picket fence.

picket_fence_recipe.flavor: If it's not white, is our life unfulfilled?

shepherds_crook_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Shepherd.
shepherds_crook_recipe.flavor: Can you tell me another story about The Shepard?

simple_wooden_chair_recipe.description: When sitting, food is 20% more satisfying.
simple_wooden_chair_recipe.flavor: Ten thousand years of research culminated in this four-legged design.

small_crate_recipe.description: For compactly storing up to 8 items
small_crate_recipe.flavor: Does the crate that stores all the things that do not store themselves, store itself?

table_for_one_recipe.description: Better than eating standing up. Unless you're watching your weight.

weaver_spindle_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Weaver.
weaver_spindle_recipe.flavor: From fiber, thread, from thread, fabric, from fabric, civilization.

window_box_brightbell_recipe.description: A planter box full of brightbell flowers, built to be placed below window frames.

window_box_frostsnap_recipe.description: A planter box full of Frostsnap flowers, built to be placed below window frames.
window_box_frostsnap_recipe.flavor: The capstone of a civilized dwelling.

wooden_door_2_recipe.flavor: This here pattern, I learned from the Squarefolk.

wooden_double_door_recipe.description: Two doors are better than one
wooden_double_door_recipe.flavor: Some people want to make an entrance... every day.
